events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the highway resulting in moderate front-end damage.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident category based on the description of the car collision.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims was assigned to handle this case to provide focused assistance.
Customer received confirmation of claim receipt along with information about the next steps and expected timeline.
Request sent to customer for submitting the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and medical bills related to the accident.
Customer provided all requested documents including accident photos, police report, and repair estimates promptly.
Claims investigator initiated review of submitted evidence and contacted repair shops for damage assessment.
Investigation concluded confirming that the collision caused agreed damages and all documents were in order.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and medical expenses was sent to the customer for review and approval.
Customer responded with consent to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the clear communication during the process.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
Payment for the claim settlement was successfully processed and transferred to the customer's bank account.
The claim has been formally closed after confirming payment receipt and customer satisfaction with the resolution.
